    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleRecorder

        public SimpleRecorder()
        Constructor Instantiates a new simple recorder. Defaults are set to recording a wave file, named 'audio.wav' for 10 seconds.

      • SimpleRecorder

        public SimpleRecorder(int duration)
        Constructor Instantiates a new simple recorder. Specifying a duration for the recording. The default name is still 'audio.wav' and it is still a wave file
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration

      • SimpleRecorder

        public SimpleRecorder(int duration,
                      java.lang.String filename)
        Constructor Instantiates a new simple recorder. Setting the duration and file name. Default format is wave.
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration
        filename - the filename

      • SimpleRecorder

        public SimpleRecorder(int duration,
                      java.lang.String filename,
                      javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format,
                      javax.sound.sampled.AudioFileFormat.Type type)
        Constructor Instantiates a new simple recorder. Where user specifies the format, type, duration and filename for the recording.
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration
        filename - the filename
        format - the format
        type - the type
